words.meaning: /ə'baid/ v. to comply with, to conform
words.vietnamese: tôn trọng, tuân theo, giữ lời

words.meaning: /ə'gri:mənt/ n. a mutual arrangement, a contract

words.vietnamese: sự chắc chắn, sự tin chắc

words.meaning: /di'tə:min/ v. to find out, to influence
/ in'geidʒ/ v. to hire, to involve
words.vietnamese: dàn xếp để tuyển dụng một người; thuê một người

words.meaning: /is'tæbli∫/ v. to institute permanently, to bring about
words.vietnamese: lập, thành lập, thiết lập, kiến lập

words.meaning: /'ɔbligei/ v. to bind legally or morally
/'pɑ:ti/ n. a person or group participating in an action or plan, the persons or sides
/provision/ n. a measure taken beforehand, a stipulation
/ri'zɔlv/ v. to deal with successfully, to declare

words.vietnamese: riêng biệt, cụ thể, đặc trưng, rõ ràng, rành mạch
